com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl

Class AutowiredBeanPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.di.impl.AutowiredBeanPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanPostProcessor

    public class AutowiredBeanPostProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanPostProcessor

    Implementation of BeanPostProcessor used to inject autowired bean dependencies after beans have been initialized.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/05/12
